h1. Storage Deck

The Storage Deck provides you with a secure, distributed storage solution with an Object Gateway S3 API.

{{html:
	<div ng-controller="StorageController">
	    <table class="table table-striped table-bordered" ng-cloak>
	    <tr>
	      <th>S3 Bucket</th>
	      <th>Access Key</th>
	      <th>Size</th>
	    </tr>
	    <tbody>
	      <tr ng-repeat="storage in storages">
	        <td><a href="{[ storage.url ]}">{[ storage.url ]}</a></td>
	        <td>{[ storage.accesskey ]}</td>
	        <td>{[ numeral(storage.size * 1024 * 1024 * 1024).format('0 b') ]}</td>
	      </tr>
	    </tbody>
	  </table>
	</div>

  <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/StorageServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
  <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/Storage/StorageController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
